SELECT T1.WARE_NO AS CODE_ID
, T1.WARE_NM AS CODE_NAME , T1.WARE_DV_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')
AND T1.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd}
AND T1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD IN('20', '30')
AND T1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20'
AND T1.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30'
ORDER BY T1.WARE_USE_YN DESC, T1.WARE_NM ASC, T1.WARE_NO ASC

SELECT T3.OG_CD , T3.OG_NM FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /* 파트너기본 */ ON T2.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T2.PRTNR_NO = T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /* 월조직내역 */ ON T3.BASE_YM = T1.APY_YM AND T3.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo}

SELECT T1.SVPD_PD_CD AS CODE_ID , T1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS CODE_NAME , T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND AS ITM_KND FROM () T1 WHERE 1 = 1
AND T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = #{itmKnd} /* 상품 */
AND T1.SVPD_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY T1.SVPD_ITEM_CD, T1.SVPD_PART_CD

SELECT T1.SVPD_PD_CD AS CODE_ID , T1.SVPD_NM_ABBR1 AS CODE_NAME , T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND AS ITM_KND , T2.WARE_NO FROM () T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ T2 ON T2.ITM_PD_CD = T1.SVPD_PD_CD WHERE T1.SVPD_ITEM_KND = #{itmKnd} /* 상품 */ AND T2.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND T1.SVPD_USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY T1.SVPD_PD_CD

SELECT D1.ITM_PD_CD AS CODE_ID , D2.PD_ABBR_NM AS CODE_NAME , D3.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND , D1.WARE_NO FROM TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ D1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS D2 ON D2.PD_CD = D1.ITM_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL D3 ON D3.PD_CD = D2.PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ D4 ON D4.WARE_NO = D1.WARE_NO WHERE D1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D2.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND D3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D3.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(D2.RVPY_STRTDT, '19000101') AND NVL(D2.RVPY_ENDDT, '99991231') AND D3.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKnd} AND D4.APY_YM = SUBSTR(#{stFromYmd}, 1, 6) AND D4.WARE_DV_CD = #{wareDvCd}
AND D4.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '20'
AND D4.WARE_DTL_DV_CD = '30'
ORDER BY D1.WARE_NO, D1.ITM_PD_CD

SELECT T1.PITM_STOC_A_GD_QTY , T1.PITM_STOC_E_GD_QTY , T1.PITM_STOC_R_GD_QTY , T2.ITM_PD_CD , T4.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND , T4.PD_PRP_VAL05 AS MGT_UNIT FROM TB_SVST_MCITM_STOC_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_CST_SV_ITM_STOC_IZ T2 ON T2.WARE_NO = T1.WARE_NO AND T2.ITM_PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD AND T1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(#{stFromYmd}, 1, 6) INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T3 ON T3.PD_CD = T1.ITM_PD_CD INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T4 ON T4.PD_CD = T3.PD_CD WHERE T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T3.PD_TP_CD = 'M' AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND T4.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN NVL(T3.RVPY_STRTDT, '19000101') AND NVL(T3.RVPY_ENDDT, '99991231') AND T1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND T2.ITM_PD_CD = #{itmPdCd} AND T4.PD_PRP_VAL19 = #{itmKnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SVST_ITM_GD_CTR_IZ ( /* 품목등급조정내역 */ ITM_GD_CTR_TP_CD /* 품목등급조정유형코드 */ , WARE_NO /* 창고번호 */ , CTR_WK_DT /* 조정작업일자 */ , CTR_SN /* 조정일련번호 */ , STAT_CTR_APY_DT /* 상태조정적용일자 */ , SV_CNR_OG_ID /* 서비스센터조직ID */ , WARE_ICHR_PRTNR_NO /* 창고담당파트너번호 */ , OG_TP_CD /* 조직유형코드 */ , ITM_KND_CD /* 품목종류코드 */ , PD_GRP_CD /* 상품그룹코드 */ , PD_CD /* 상품코드 */ , BFCT_NOM_STOC_A_GD_QTY /* 조정전정상재고A등급수량 */ , BFCT_NOM_STOC_E_GD_QTY /* 조정전정상재고E등급수량 */ , BFCT_NOM_STOC_R_GD_QTY /* 조정전정상재고R등급수량 */ , BFCT_ITM_GD_CD /* 조정전품목등급코드 */ , AFCT_ITM_GD_CD /* 조정후품목등급코드 */ , CTR_QTY /* 조정수량 */ , ITM_GD_CTR_RSON_CD /* 품목등급조정사유코드 */ , RMK_CN /* 비고내용 */ , DTA_DL_YN /* 데이터삭제여부 */ ) VALUES ( #{itmGdCtrTpCd} , #{wareNo} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , #{ctrSn} , #{statCtrApyDt} , (SELECT T3.OG_ID FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 /* 월별창고내역 */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS T2 /* 파트너기본 */ ON T2.OG_TP_CD = T1.OG_TP_CD AND T2.PRTNR_NO = T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T3 /* 월조직내역 */ ON T3.BASE_YM = T1.APY_YM AND T3.OG_ID = T1.OG_ID AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND T1.WARE_NO = #{wareNo}) , ( SELECT T1.WARE_MNGT_PRTNR_NO FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 WHERE APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y') , ( SELECT T1.OG_TP_CD FROM TB_SVST_MCBY_WARE_IZ T1 WHERE APY_YM = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') AND WARE_NO = #{wareNo} AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND WARE_USE_YN = 'Y') , #{itemKnd} , ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE T1.PD_CD = #{itmPdCd}) , #{itmPdCd} , #{bfctNomStocAGdQty} , #{bfctNomStocEGdQty} , #{bfctNomStocRGdQty} , #{bfctItmGdCd} , #{afctItmGdCd} , #{ctrQty} , #{itmGdCtrRsonCd} , #{rmkCn} , 'N' )
